x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/messagedefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/MessageDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"MessageDefinition","id":"05e10ff4-c654-42bb-9379-613da3eb414e","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/MessageDefinition/example","name":"EXAMPLE","title":"Message definition base example","status":"draft","experimental":true,"date":"2016-11-09T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"Health Level Seven, Int'l","contact":[{"telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org"}]}],"purpose":"Defines a base example for other MessageDefinition instances.","eventCoding":{"system":"http://example.org/fhir/message-events","code":"admin-notify"},"category":"notification","meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:18.168+08:00"}}'
